type: Tutorial Step - Ready for More Tutorials?

definition.text: There are a few more tutorials ready to walk you through other matters upon request!

paragraphs.text: At the bottom of this workspace:
Developers Intro is a technical overview!
Install a New Market helps you go beyond BTC/USDT!
Load the Trading System Design Tutorials plugin workspace from the tab on the left to learn how to design strategies!

Also, the Weak-hands Buster V.2 plugin workspace features a tutorial about the Trading Bot Layers to complete your understanding of simulations and how they help while designing and debugging strategies.
